sentences.sContent: At that time, we did not fully grasp the significance of what had happened.
sentences.sCn: 当时，我们没有完全明白所发生之事的重要性。

sentences.sContent: Some people find the idea of relativity difficult to grasp.
sentences.sCn: 有些人觉得相对论的概念很难理解。

sentences.sContent: ...practice is of great importance for those who are determined to truly grasp knowledge...
...we cannot genuinely grasp the essence of it...

words.tran: 理解，领会（grasp的现在分词形式）；抓紧，抓牢

trans.tranOther: to completely understand a fact or an idea, especially a complicated one
